info.brief_description: blaze the cat want a twin sister
info.description: sonic makeover 2 is a sequel to sonic makeover. blaze wants a twin sister. the transformation must be step by step and it needs a mental change you choose how blaze turns sonic into a twin sister and his name turns into Samantha or sapphire and he turns into a blue version version of her.
